attributes.action: Introduce a short term Capital Gains Tax and reduce it zero over 10Years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would impliment the Tax Reform Commission proposals of 19th October 2006.  Proposals 33 to 35. Inheritance Tax would be covered by the short term Capital Gains Tax.
This would help those with long term assets held since 1982 when selling them to fund retirement.
